IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: To assist members of the low-income community through the provision of services and programs which attack the cycle of poverty and to advocate on their behalf with governmental agencies and the community-at-large.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To assist members of the low-income community through the provision of services and programs which attack the cycle of poverty.
IRS990.Description: Energy programs assist qualifying, low-income residents of the greater Fall River/New Bedford/Taunton areas with energy bills, weatherization improvements, and furnace/boiler replacements.

Activity2.Description: Early childhood education programs assist qualifying, low-income residents of the greater Fall River area to increase children's effectiveness in dealing with everyday life situations and later responsibilities in school and life.

Activity3.Description: Senior programs assist qualifying, low-income seniors with job preparation, training and volunteer opportunities.

ActivityOther.Description: Various programs including child care, health programs, emergency services, self-sufficiency, information, referral and advocacy for low-income residents of the greater Fall River area.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The 990 is reviewed contemporaneously with the audited financial statements by the Executive/Finance Committee.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Board members sign a statement attesting to their independence and absence of conflict of interest and give it to the chairperson annually.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Executive Committee meets to deliberate and approve the Executive Director's salary each year. Deliberations and discussions are evidenced by contemporaneous Executive Committee minutes.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization does not make these documents available to the public.
